meanings.definition: A person who adds sugar to something.
meanings.sent1: The sugarers sprinkled sugar on top of the cookies.
meanings.sent2: The baker was known for being a generous sugarer of his pastries.
meanings.sent3: The sugarers at the party made the lemonade too sweet to drink.
meanings.sent4: She was a sugarer of words, always adding a touch of sweetness to her stories.
meanings.sent5: The little girl watched in awe as the sugarers transformed plain dough into delicious treats.

meanings.definition: Those who work in the sugar industry.
meanings.sent1: The sugarers harvested sugarcane under the hot sun.
meanings.sent2: The sugarers were busy refining sugar in the factory.
meanings.sent3: The sugarers joked about having sweet dreams of sugar mountains.
meanings.sent4: In the land of sugarers, everything seemed to have a hint of sweetness.
meanings.sent5: The sugarers' hands were always sticky from working with sugar all day.
